content: the first colour group and do your first intarsia twist you don t have to undo the slip knot for the third colour group quite yet for the cuff the last pair of stitches in each colour block will be slipped rather than worked into slip the first stitch purlwise with yarns in back then slip the second stitch purlwise with yarns in front also in this chart you won t always knit the front layer and purl the back layer instead for the ribbing some pairs will be two knits and the others will be two purls refer to the technique section for more details follow the last two row of the chart eight times for a total of 18 row after the cast on leg switch to your larger needles and refer to the leg chart for this section after a few row of setting up the intarsia colour blockswillspiralaroundthesock soeachrowwillstartonecolumnoverfromwherethepreviousrowended onalternating row you k1 wyib p1 wyif bring the third group of yarns to the front rather than twisting just let the third yarns rest between the needles with the ends hanging down the front of the work work to the end of the first colour block pick up the second group of yarns as the working yarns but don t let go of the first group k1 wyib p1 wyif drop the first group of yarns work to the end of the second colour block pick up the third group of yarns as the working yarns but don t let go of the second group k1 wyib p1 wyif drop the second group of yarns work to the end of the third colour block slip one pair the yarn loop can now be pulled through and row 3 is complete turn to start row 4 for future odd-numbered row with the first group of yarns slip one pair then knit/purl one pair and then bring the third group of yarns to the front similar to row 3 when you nearly reach the end of a colour block you ll reach the next group of yarns pick up this next group of yarns to carry with the old yarns knit/purl one final pair with the old yarns moving the new yarns to the back and front as unused yarns then to get the old yarns in place ready for the next row sixy helix 5 ©2022 pi fisher
